texts.text: Realms alpha build 1[1][2] is the first build version released for the Realms phase of v0.15.0 alpha. Unlike the other first builds of a major update, where most of the planned stuff is added in, this build is for the Realms phase of 0.15, the major stuff will come "soon!".[3]

Requires logging in to Microsoft Xbox Live account.
Free until the full release of v0.15.0.[4]

Realms button
Replaces the old Options button.
Options button
Is now an icon
Beside the Languages icon.

Options button is now an icon
Moved to the bottom-right of the screen, next to the Languages button
"Minecraft Realms is coming to MC:PE and Win 10! http://www.mojang.com/2016/04/were-working-on-minecraft-realms-for-pocket-and-win-10/ Alpha test starting now on Android!" – @jeb_ on Twitter
"People, the 0.15 Alpha is just for Realms, there are no 0.15 features like Pistons! They will come later :)" – @_tomcc on Twitter
"We just released Realms MCPE Alpha on Android, it will be free for a while for anyone that helps us test it :)" – @tomcc_ on Twitter
